title: Daktacort 10G Cream
details:
Daktacort cream is an anti-fungal ointment for treating superficial inflamed problems. Daktacort cream for yeast infection is also recommended.

Uses And Benefits:

Daktacort cream uses and benefits are described below. 

<
READ MORE
precautions: Read the necessary precautions carefully before using Daktacort cream. It is recommended to talk to your doctor first before using the cream. The detailed precautions are described below:Do not use the Dakktacort ointment if you are allergic to any of its ingredients like Hydrocortisone or miconazole nitrate.Daktacort cream for babies is not suitable, but you can consult your doctor.Consult your doctor first before applying if you have any other skin problems like sores or herpes etc.Do not apply the cream to your face and avoid its contact with your eyes.Hydrocortisone cream for the baby's face is not advisable, so consulting a doctor is recommended.Avoid going outside in sun or flame when you have applied the cream as it can result in the formation of severe burns.The cream must not be used for longer periods of time, including children. It is not advisable to use it for more than 7 days.The daktacort cream should not be applied on large surfaces of the body, especially for children.The treated area must not be covered by the dressing.For elderly patients, the cream must not be used for many days because it causes skin thinning. If you are a diabetic patient must consult the doctor prior to using the cream.Brief your doctor about your medical health condition and medicines you are taking (if any).Consult your doctor before applying for the medicine if you are pregnant or during breastfeeding.Store the Daktacort cream in a cool place.Keep it away from the reach of children.If you are taking any anticoagulants, consult your doctor before using the cream.It is contraindicated in patients with known Hypersensitivity to the active ingredient. Tell your doctor/Pharmacist if you are Allergic to it; or to other azole antifungals such as clotrimazole, econazole, or ketoconazole; or if you have any other Allergies.
effects: Daktacort cream side effects are described below. If you experience prolonged and, severe side effects must visit the doctor.Irritated skin.Itching.Rash on skin.Blurred vision.Slight inflammation.Burning sensation at the infected area.As it contains benzoic acid and butylated hydroxyanisole, it might cause irritation on the skin, mucosal membrane, and eyes. Patches of skin might be formed, but it is not a common side effect.Extreme side effects include swelling at the face, lips, throat, or eyes. You need to immediately consult a doctor in that case.

precautions: Some necessary precautions should be taken while using Daktarin Oral Gel. Read and follow the instructions carefully written in the leaflet of the medicine. This medicine is used in the mouth ONLY. precautions: Every Anti-fungal cream needs strict precautionary measures before it can be applied, such as:Make sure to avoid Travocort from the eyes.
